meanings.definition: One of a million equal parts.
meanings.sent1: I ate a millionth of the cake.
meanings.sent2: The millionth piece of the puzzle was missing.
meanings.sent3: The ant carried a millionth of its weight in food.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rare as finding a millionth diamond.
meanings.sent5: The millionth drop of rain completed the puddle.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to one millionth.
meanings.sent1: She finished in the millionth place in the race.
meanings.sent2: The millionth day of the year is a special milestone.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was the millionth customer at the store.
meanings.sent4: The millionth star in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: Reaching the millionth page of the book felt like an achievement.
